ygData.subject: Re: Old Euridan and Elder Elvish learning
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for your thoughts.  I will try these theories out soon and let you know my progress.  The group memebers (my normal party) would not mind so much.  But
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for your thoughts. I will try these theories out soon and let you
know my progress. The group memebers (my normal party) would not mind so
much. But in a new group some people get irritated with the SPAM'ing
...just have to know your group you are with at the time.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Karl Hatteland [mailto:karlh@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 11:30 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Old Euridan and Elder Elvish learning


From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>

I know that as a darkelf or Higelf you start with elder elvish.
If you sit by them, I dont think you would learn any thing. But maybe if you
hailed them in Old erudin they would answer you in old erudin and you would
learn :) ( this Im not sure off)

And why would it not be fair to the other in the group, ill be happy to
learn the language. :)
